data.text:
"Democracies, by design, are intertwined with the practice of dialogue. In a representative democracy, citizens delegate authority to elected representatives. However, coalition government, contrary to popular perceptions of being weak and ineffective, in fact give opportunity for more collaborative and inclusive governance models." Read Kshetra's piece "The Value of Dialogue in Democracy" in the Hindustan Times: https://lnkd.in/gCimKPfh

Delighted at the coverage our 5-year MoU to collaborate with NALSAR University of Law, Hyderabad, National Academy of Legal Studies & Research (NALSAR) University Hyderabad, DoMS NALSAR (Business School of NALSAR) is getting in both national and regional press. Here is a glimpse. Here's to building #community capacity for #conflictresolution and co-creating an #ecosystem for #dialogue. #DialogicMethod #NALSAR #Law #Anganwadi #Paralegals https://lnkd.in/g8Ymups9

We are honoured to be signing a 5-year MoU with NALSAR University and through the University’s student body, we hope to create a support structure for Paralegals, Anganwadi Teachers, and community leaders to effectively use dialogue to transform conflict into collaboration. We have conducted two pilot workshops in Telangana in the last year before commencing this project, and found both Paralegal volunteers and Anganwadi teachers eager to adopt the Dialogic Method and related skills in their on ground work to effect lasting change in their communities. To learn more and to collaborate with Kshetra team, please email us: hello@kshetra.space #dialogue #dialogicmethod #systemschange #socialimpact #conflictresolution #earlychildhood

Ever wondered how powerful Dialogue can be as a tool to drive social and environmental change at scale? In this series - we share some of the insights and examples from our upcoming Kshetra White Paper No. 1: “What is Dialogue and What Can it Do?” (Forthcoming, June 2024). Reach out for an advance copy: hello@kshetra.space #dialoge #dialogicmethod #socialimpact #kenya #greenbeltmovement PS: Images used are licensed stock photos used for representative purposes only.

Intern with us @ Kshetra Looking for a fun but challenging internship? We are looking for young, dynamic people willing to intern in the following roles: Design support: - Work with Outreach team to brainstorm content ideas and create a social media strategy and calendar - Create design templates for post series/campaign for various digital platforms Set up automation and analytics for Kshetra's digital platforms - Other support tasks as may be requested - Send your resume to deedee@kshetra.space with cc to stuti@kshetra.space Operations support: - Supports the execution of events and service deliveries - Creates knowledge products such as blogs - Conducts directed research across concepts or potential partners based on the needs of the team. - Other organisational and administrative support - Send your resume to stuti@kshetra.space with cc to krishna@kshetra.space This is a paid full-time internship. We request a minimum commitment of 6 weeks to working in person from our office in Bangalore #dialoge #dialogicmethod #internship #socialsectorhiring

What Happens at Kshetra Events? (Part 2) At our recent workshop in #Hyderabad on Problem Solving through #Dialogue, we invited participants to experience some of the key elements of the 9 step Dialogic Method such as #Empathy, #ValueCreation and #ConfirmationBias through role playing, thought experiments, and collaborative solutioning. What added to the magic of this experiential workshop was the #diversity and #engagement level of our audience: Undergrad students, Postdoctoral researchers, Doctors, Engineers, HR professionals, DJs, Podcasters, and Senior leaders in business and nonprofit worlds. If this sounds interesting to you, DM (pun-unintended) us! We'd love to partner with #changemakers addressing critical social and environmental challenges of our times. The #DialogicMethod is a high utility #framework that gives you a structured and innovative approach to solving problems together with your team, community #stakeholders, #government & other ecosystem players. Follow us for updates on upcoming Kshetra events, and more!
